availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Switzerland County, Indiana, farmer. Indiana native. Married to Ann E. Larrison. Father of Archie Larrison and Harvie Larrison. Farmer in Switzerland County in 1860. Farmer in Switzerland County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Switzerland County, Posey, p. 2.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Switzerland County, Posey, p. 384B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Indiana, 3rd Congressional District, Switzerland County, York Township, Vol. 2 of 3, June 1863, p. 283, p. 15 of 562 of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com on October 2, 2020).
